trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> types to UI Automation.
The element associated with this automation peer.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> class.
Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.TabItem" /> enumeration value.
Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.

An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SelectionItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.VirtualizedItem" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="patternInterface" />가 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SelectionItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> 또는 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.VirtualizedItem" />인 경우 컨트롤 패턴을 지원하는 개체이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Hides all nodes, controls, or content that are descendants of the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 하위 항목인 모든 노드, 컨트롤 또는 내용을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 모든 자식 노드, 컨트롤 또는 내용을 표시합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />에 연결된 컨트롤의 확장 또는 축소 상태를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the control within the visible region of the container.
trans-unit.target: 컨테이너의 표시 영역 내에 컨트롤을 표시하기 위해 컨테이너 개체의 콘텐츠 영역을 스크롤합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
The user cannot interact with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 사용자는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" />과 상호 작용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A element other than the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> is selected.
This API is not implemented.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> is selected.
